verses.verse: In the year <WH8141> that king <WH4428> Uziyah-yahu <WH5818> died <WH4194> I saw <WH7200> <WH8799> also <WH853> the YY <WH136> sitting <WH3427> <WH8802> upon a throne <WH3678>, high <WH7311> <WH8802> and lifted up <WH5375> <WH8737>, and his train <WH7757> filled <WH4392> <WH853> the temple <WH1964>.

Above <WH4605> it stood <WH5975> <WH8802> the S'rafims <WH8314>: each one <WH259> had six <WH8337> wings <WH3671>; with twain <WH8147> he covered <WH3680> <WH8762> his face <WH6440>, and with twain <WH8147> he covered <WH3680> <WH8762> his feet <WH7272>, and with twain <WH8147> he did fly <WH5774> <WH8787>.

And one cried <WH7121> <WH8804> unto another, and said <WH559> <WH8804>, Holy <WH6918>, holy <WH6918>, holy <WH6918>, is the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>: the whole earth <WH776> is full <WH4393> of his glory <WH3519>.
And the posts <WH520> of the door <WH5592> moved <WH5128> <WH8799> at the voice <WH6963> of him that cried <WH7121> <WH8802>, and the house <WH1004> was filled <WH4390> <WH8735> with smoke <WH6227>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> I, Woe <WH188> is me! for I am undone <WH1820> <WH8738>; because I am a man <WH376> of unclean <WH2931> lips <WH8193>, and I dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in the midst <WH8432> of a people <WH5971> of unclean <WH2931> lips <WH8193>: for mine eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> the King <WH4428>, the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>.

Then flew <WH5774> <WH8799> one <WH259> of the S'rafims <WH8314> unto me, having a live coal <WH7531> in his hand <WH3027>, which he had taken <WH3947> <WH8804> with the tongs <WH4457> from off the altar <WH4196>:

And he laid <WH5060> <WH8686> it upon my mouth <WH6310>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Lo, this hath touched <WH5060> <WH8804> thy lips <WH8193>; and thine iniquity <WH5771> is taken away <WH5493> <WH8804>, and thy sin <WH2403> purged <WH3722> <WH8792>.

Also I heard <WH8085> <WH8799> the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH136>, saying <WH559> <WH8802>, Whom shall I send <WH7971> <WH8799>, and who will go <WH3212> <WH8799> for us? Then said <WH559> <WH8799> I, Here am I; send <WH7971> <WH8798> me.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Go <WH3212> <WH8798>, and tell <WH559> <WH8804> this people <WH5971>, Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> ye indeed <WH8085> <WH8800>, but understand <WH995> <WH8799> not; and see <WH7200> <WH8798> ye indeed <WH7200> <WH8800>, but perceive <WH3045> <WH8799> not.

Make the heart <WH3820> of this people <WH5971> fat <WH8080> <WH8685>, and make their ears <WH241> heavy <WH3513> <WH8685>, and shut <WH8173> <WH8685> their eyes <WH5869>; lest they see <WH7200> <WH8799> with their eyes <WH5869>, and hear <WH8085> <WH8799> with their ears <WH241>, and understand <WH995> <WH8799> with their heart <WH3824>, and convert <WH7725> <WH8802>, and be healed <WH7495> <WH8804>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> I, YY <WH136>, how long? And he answered <WH559> <WH8799>, Until the cities <WH5892> be wasted <WH7582> <WH8804> without inhabitant <WH3427> <WH8802>, and the houses <WH1004> without man <WH120>, and the land <WH127> be utterly <WH8077> desolate <WH7582> <WH8735>,
And the YY <WH3068> have removed <WH7368> men <WH120> far away <WH7368> <WH8765>, and there be a great <WH7227> forsaking <WH5805> in the midst <WH7130> of the land <WH776>.

But yet in it shall be a tenth <WH6224>, and it shall return <WH7725> <WH8804>, and shall be eaten <WH1197> <WH8763>: as a teil tree <WH424>, and as an oak <WH437>, whose substance <WH4678> is in them, when they cast <WH7995> their leaves: so the holy <WH6944> seed <WH2233> shall be the substance <WH4678> thereof.
